#summary Contains a list of all the required hardware for this mod

= 1. Required Hardware =

  * [http://ardrone.parrot.com/parrot-ar-drone/ Parrot AR.Drone] with [http://www.ardrone-flyers.com/wiki/V1.3.3 Firmware 1.3.3]
  * 6CH RC Radio + Receiver (works with 5CH but 6CH recommended!)
  * [http://www.arduino.cc/en/Main/ArduinoBoardProMini Arduino Pro Mini 328 - 5V/16MHz] ([http://www.sparkfun.com/products/9218 buy])
  * FTDI Basic Breakout - 5V ([http://www.sparkfun.com/products/9716 buy])
  * USB Cable: Type A (male) <> Mini-USB Type B (male)
  * Break away headers with right angle (or similar connectors to soldier onto the Arduino board to connect it to the FTDI Basic) ([http://www.sparkfun.com/products/553 buy])
  * [http://octopart.com/511100850-molex-3763204 Molex 511100850] or similar 2x4 2.00mm (.079") pitch connector (I know this one is hard to get, be creative and better get two or three of em at once! ;)
  https://ardudrone.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Molex-511100850.gif
  * Cables/connectors to connect your RC Receiver to the Arduino board (this really depends on your setup)
  * Optional but recommended: shrinking tube for the cable and to protect the Arduino
